t =int(raw_input())
while(t):
    count=0
    n = int(raw_input())
    a = {}
    for i in range(0,n):
        c = list(raw_input())
        b = c.pop(-1)
        a[''.join(c)]=b
    c = a.values()
    for i in c:
        if i=='+':
            count=count+1
        elif i=='-':
            count=count-1
    print count
    t=t-1
